'''Danielle Brooks''' (born September 17, 1989)<ref>[https://www.ibdb.com/broadway-cast-staff/danielle-brooks-501125 Danielle Brooks - Broadway Cast and Staff]</ref> is an American actress and singer. She is well known for her breakthrough role as Tasha “Taystee” Jefferson in the Netflix series ''{{w|Orange Is the New Black}}'' and her role as Leota Adebayo in the ''{{w|Peacemaker (TV series)|Peacemaker}}'' TV series.

== In the ''Minecraft'' franchise ==
{{Main|Movie:Dawn Runcie}}
Brooks is the actor portraying Dawn in ''[[A Minecraft Movie]]''. She was revealed to be featuring in the movie in late 2023<ref>{{Citation|url=https://deadline.com/2023/11/minecraft-jason-momoa-danielle-brooks-sebastian-eugene-hansen-1235646560/|title=‘Minecraft’: Warner Bros Movie Adds Danielle Brooks & Sebastian Eugene Hansen|author=[https://deadline.com/author/adalessandro/ Anthony D'Alessandro]|website=Deadline|date=November 30, 2023}}</ref> and made her first appearance as Dawn on September 4, 2024 in the movie's teaser trailer.
